mapper.select: select c.* from coupon c join coupon_category cc on c.id = cc.coupon_id join category c2 on cc.category_id = c2.id join activity a on c.activity_id = a.id where c2.id = #{id} and a.start_time < NOW() and a.end_time > Now();

select c.* from coupon c join user_coupon uc on c.id = uc.coupon_id join user u on uc.user_id = u.id where uc.status = 1 and u.id = #{uid} and c.start_time < NOW() and c.end_time > NOW() and uc.order_id is null;

select c.* from coupon c join user_coupon uc on c.id = uc.coupon_id join user u on uc.user_id = u.id where uc.status = 2 and u.id = #{uid} and c.start_time < NOW() and c.end_time > NOW() and uc.order_id is null;
select c.* from coupon c join user_coupon uc on c.id = uc.coupon_id join user u on uc.user_id = u.id where uc.status <> 2 and u.id = #{uid} and c.end_time < NOW() and uc.order_id is null;
